headline: Is Stanley Black & Decker’s (SWK) Shift to Electrified Outdoor Tools Enough to Reinforce Its Competitive Edge?
summary: Stanley Black & Decker recently benefited from its ongoing global cost-reduction program and expanded its electric outdoor power equipment offerings through acquisitions of MTD Holdings and Excel Industries. This combination of operational efficiencies and entry into high-growth electrified outdoor products has strengthened the company's competitive position despite recent challenges from segment softness and currency fluctuations. We'll examine how the successful rollout of cost-reduction...
